0: "I brought this case to stand up for myself and other students who might be afraid to express their right-of-center views," Barnes said in a statement. "Everyone knows that if a student wears an anti-Trump shirt to school, the teachers won't think twice about it. But when I wore a pro-Trump shirt, I got suspended.
